name: dis_rival_02
text: I will speak ill of the dead.
text_simple: i will speak ill of the dead

name: dis_rival_04
text: An ounce of invention, a pound of cure.
text_simple: an ounce of invention a pound of cure

name: dis_rival_05
text: It had to be done, cousin.
text_simple: it had to be done cousin

name: dis_rival_06
text: Axe, did your mother drop you on your head?
text_simple: axe did your mother drop you on your head

name: dis_rival_07
text: Axe, you always were a bit slow. Now a bit dead.
text_simple: axe you always were a bit slow now a bit dead

name: dis_rival_08
text: Warlock, the Oglodi will sign your name in the book of ancestors.
text_simple: warlock the oglodi will sign your name in the book of ancestors

name: dis_rival_09
text: Warlock, of all the Oglodi, you were the most learned, and the most misguided.
text_simple: warlock of all the oglodi you were the most learned and the most misguided

name: dis_rival_10
text: Warlock, what is in that book of yours?
text_simple: warlock what is in that book of yours

name: dis_rival_11
text: Warlock, I'll add your book to my collection.
text_simple: warlock ill add your book to my collection

name: dis_rival_12
text: My Strider is beyond your influence, Chen.
text_simple: my strider is beyond your influence chen

name: dis_rival_14
text: You were already dead from the neck up, now from the neck down.
text_simple: you were already dead from the neck up now from the neck down

name: dis_rival_15
text: Hmm, the keen folk are clever, but they die like the rest.
text_simple: hmm the keen folk are clever but they die like the rest

name: dis_rival_17
text: Your stormcraft was strong, your defenses weak.
text_simple: your stormcraft was strong your defenses weak

name: dis_rival_19
text: Your skill with lightning was impressive, I admit.
text_simple: your skill with lightning was impressive i admit

name: dis_rival_20
text: Rattletrap, you keens are a pleasure to kill.
text_simple: rattletrap you keens are a pleasure to kill

name: dis_rival_21
text: I admire your craftsmanship; your durability I question.
text_simple: i admire your craftsmanship your durability i question

name: dis_rival_22
text: Gyro, you were crazy even for the keenfolk.
text_simple: gyro you were crazy even for the keenfolk

name: dis_rival_23
text: Gyro, your craft dies with you.
text_simple: gyro your craft dies with you

name: dis_rival_24
text: You'll catch your death out there.
text_simple: youll catch your death out there

text: A small-keen and his ogre meet their deaths.
